title: EASY DIY: Homemade Leather Trinket Trays

meta.description:
Make leather valet/trinket dishes using a technique called wet molding. 
It's a SUPER EASY DIY, only 3 things required: 
- Vegetable Tanned Leather (I use 5 oz in this video)
- Round Pyrex Containers
- Water 

Please like and subscribe. It truly goes along way in supporting our small business.

Our Leather Goods: www.springbokcraftco.etsy.com
Patterns and Supplies/Leather: www.springbokcraftsupply.etsy.com

comments.text: First of, thank you for such simplicity. I am a minimalist and thoroughly enjoy all of your creations. Question: can I fold the leather such that the fluffy side  (sorry don't know the correct terminology) is on the inside instead of the outside? In your example, the smooth side is on the inside. I am just wondering if the process is the same.
comments.author: stephaniereich1098

comments.text: Nice but I would have the flesh side of the leather on the outside of the tray.
